name: The Survival: Island Adventure
description:
New survival adventure on island!
Use different blocks and instruments to create you own world!
Craft and build whatever you want!

► The Survival 2017 - new open world!
► Build and craft game!
► Different biomes and animals!
► Many resources!
► Beware wild animals!
► Islands system - sand and tropic biomes!
► Survival simulator 3d!
► Day/night and weather system!
